text: @ABCPolitics Says the guy that if New York was a country it would have almost twice as many deaths per million than anyone else, and in total has 10 times more than Florida & 20 times more than Texas. What a jerk & why isn't the media holding this creep to account? #AndrewCuomo #COVID19
